Note: Hard guild raids always drop an additional void token. Must reach Minimum tier.
Legendary guild raids always drop an additional void token. Must reach Minimum tier.
Secutor always drops 1 Thiadoran Fig. Must reach Minimum tier.

Condition (Python): name == 'Bone Dragon' and difficulty == 'Easy' and mode == 'raiding'
Note: Easy Bone Dragon always drops 1 stat point. Must reach Minimum tier.

Condition (Python): name == 'Bone Dragon' and difficulty == 'Hard' and mode == 'raiding'
Note: Hard Bone Dragon always drops 2 stat points. Must reach Minimum tier.

Condition (Python): name == 'Bone Dragon' and difficulty == 'Legendary' and mode == 'raiding'
Note: Legendary Bone Dragon always drops 4 stat points. Must reach Minimum tier.

Condition (Python): name == 'Jagar the Red' and difficulty == 'Legendary' and mode == 'raiding'
Note: On legendary difficulty, Jagar the Red drops a <u>unique</u> and <u>guaranteed</u> chest at max share for its summoner (level one of summoner's leftovers is needed).
